description: portrait of head and shoulders of man looking left with hand across chest in an oval surrounded by an elaborate rectangular frame on a sheet cut in octagonal shape
inscription:
Title and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [ DOMENICO BECCAFUMI/ PITTORE SANESE]; on sheet in pencil:[1-98]
portfolio: From Giorgio Vasari's "Le vite de più eccellenti pittori scultori ed architetti" (Florence, 1568)
title: Portrait of Domenico Beccafumi
